mapper.select: SELECT I.NO AS NO, COUNT(IL.PATIENT_NO) AS NUMBER_OF_PATIENTS FROM INPATIENT I LEFT JOIN INPATIENT_LIST IL ON I.NO = IL.INPATIENT_NO GROUP BY I.NO

SELECT NO, NAME, GENDER, CASE WHEN gender = 'M' THEN RPAD(SUBSTR(registration_number, 1, 7) || '-1******', LENGTH(registration_number), '*') WHEN gender = 'F' THEN RPAD(SUBSTR(registration_number, 1, 7) || '-2******', LENGTH(registration_number), '*') ELSE registration_number END AS REGISTRATION_NUMBER, PHONE_NUMBER, EMAIL, CAUTION FROM PATIENT WHERE NAME = #{name}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ADMISSION_RECORD(NO, PATIENT_NO, INPATIENT_NO, REASON, ADMISSION_DATE) VALUES(SEQ_ADMISSION_RECORD_NO.NEXTVAL, #{patientNo}, #{no}, #{reason}, TO_TIMESTAMP(#{admissionDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD"T"HH24:MI'))
INSERT INTO INPATIENT_LIST(NO, INPATIENT_NO, PATIENT_NO) VALUES(SEQ_INPATIENT_LIST_NO.NEXTVAL, #{no}, #{patientNo})
mapper.select: SELECT R.NO AS ADMISSION_RECORD_NO, R.PATIENT_NO, P.NAME AS PATIENT_NAME, R.INPATIENT_NO AS NO, R.ADMISSION_DATE, R.DISCHARGE_DATE, I.INPATIENT_POSITION FROM ADMISSION_RECORD R JOIN INPATIENT I ON I.NO = R.INPATIENT_NO JOIN PATIENT P ON P.NO = R.PATIENT_NO

SELECT R.NO AS ADMISSION_RECORD_NO, R.PATIENT_NO, P.NAME AS PATIENT_NAME, R.INPATIENT_NO AS NO, R.REASON, R.ADMISSION_DATE, R.DISCHARGE_DATE FROM ADMISSION_RECORD R JOIN PATIENT P ON R.PATIENT_NO = P.NO WHERE R.NO = #{admissionRecordNo}
mapper.update: UPDATE ADMISSION_RECORD SET DISCHARGE_DATE = TO_TIMESTAMP(#{dischargeDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD"T"HH24:MI') WHERE NO = #{admissionRecordNo}
